name: Dizzy and the Mushrooms Pie (ZX Spectrum Edition)
name_original: Dizzy and the Mushrooms Pie (ZX Spectrum Edition)
description:
ZX Spectrum remake of PC game "Dizzy and the Mushrooms Pie" (by Alexandru Simion) Game made with Dizzy Scripting Engine V1.0 (by Hippiman) and DizzyAge Map Editor (by Alexandru Simion)

-------------------- 

Game made for ZX-Spectrum personal computer and you need an emulator program (like Spectaculator or Unreal Speccy to run it)

--------------------

Story: 

Daisy sends Dizzy to find mushrooms for a special pie, but he gets trapped inside a cave and this is only the start of his troubles... 

---------------

Creators: 

Story, puzzles: Alexandru Simion
Code: Verm-V 
Graphics: 
Title Screen: Verm-V (demake original PC title screen)
Music: 
 - Menu - "Tracmemo (2006)" by MmcM
 - Game - "Flow (1999)" by MmcM
Beta testing: VK007, Titus, Hippiman 

Based on characters created by Oliver Twins
